Forest Survival Plot teal Module

tm_g_forest_tte.Rd

This is teal module produces a grid style Forest plot for time-to-event data with ADaM structure

tm_g_forest_tte(label, dataname, arm_var, subgroup_var, paramcd,
  plot_height = c(600, 200, 2000), cex = 1.3,
  pre_output = helpText("graph needs to be of a certain width to be displayed"),
  post_output = NULL)

Arguments

label

menu item label of the module in the teal app
dataname

(character) analysis data used in teal module, needs to be available in the list passed to the data argument of init. Note that the data is expected to be in vertical form with the PARAMCD variable filtering to one observation per patient.
arm_var

choices_selected object with all available choices and preselected option for variable names that can be used as arm_var
subgroup_var

choices_selected object with all available choices and preselected option for variable names that can be used as the default subgroups
paramcd

choices_selected object with all available choices and preselected option for variable names that can be used as PARAMCD variable
plot_height

vector with three elements defining selected, min and max plot height
cex

multiplier applied to overall font size
pre_output

optional, shiny.tag with text placed before the output to put the output into context. For example the helpText elements are useful.
post_output

optional, shiny.tag with text placed before the output to put the output into context. For example the helpText elements are useful.

Examples

library(random.cdisc.data)

ADSL <- radsl(cached = TRUE)
ADTTE <- radtte(ADSL, cached = TRUE)

ADSL$RACE <- droplevels(ADSL$RACE)

app <- init(
  data = cdisc_data(
    cdisc_dataset("ADSL", ADSL),
    cdisc_dataset("ADTTE", ADTTE),
    code = 'ADSL <- ADSL <- radsl(cached = TRUE)
            ADTTE <- radtte(ADSL, cached = TRUE)
            ADSL$RACE <- droplevels(ADSL$RACE)',
    check = FALSE
    ),
  modules = root_modules(
    tm_g_forest_tte(
       label = "Forest Survival",
       dataname = "ADTTE",
       arm_var = choices_selected(c("ARM", "ARMCD"), "ARM"),
       subgroup_var = choices_selected(names(ADSL), c("RACE", "SEX")),
       paramcd = choices_selected(c("OS", "PFS"), "OS"),
       plot_height = c(600, 200, 2000)
    )
  )
)

if (FALSE) {
  shinyApp(app$ui, app$server)
}
